Hero.text: {=lord_polish_2a.text}Apparently a descendant of Pomeranian Duke Siemomysł. Świętobor recognized the supremacy of the Holy Roman Empire and tried to get rid of dependence on the Polish Dukedom. The struggle resulted in imprisonment and he was released by his relative Bolesław III Wrymouth. Possibly the founder of the House of Griffin.

{=lord_polish_7a.text}The von Borck (Borkowie) are an old noble family from Western Pomerania. Borko I - is the first member of the family who was mentioned in written sources. Borko I was a nobleman of Slavic origin in the service of the Dukes of Pomerania. Borko is the father of Borko I, taken from genealogical trees. Couldn't find any information about him, probably a legendary person.
